import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import api from'../Router/api';import"../comp_css/Payment.css";import successtBg from"../picture/successbg.webp";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const bg={backgroundImage:"url(".concat(successtBg,")"),backgroundSize:"cover",backgroundRepeat:"no-repeat",backgroundPosition:"center center"};const Payment=()=>{const[paymentData,setPaymentData]=useState({});const userid=localStorage.getItem("userid");const orderid=localStorage.getItem("orderid");const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{document.title='Ecommerse | Payment';api.post("/ecom/order-payments/makePayment?orderId=".concat(orderid,"&userId=").concat(userid)).then(response=>{// Fix the typo here (reponse -> response)
setPaymentData(response.data);}).catch(error=>{console.error("Error fetching data from the API: ",error);});},[userid,orderid]);setTimeout(()=>{navigate("/");},1000);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"payment-container",style:bg,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"payment-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{style:{color:"green"},children:"Payment Details"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Name: ",paymentData.user&&paymentData.user.firstName," ",paymentData.user&&paymentData.user.lastName]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Email: ",paymentData.user&&paymentData.user.email]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Phone Number: ",paymentData.user&&paymentData.user.phoneNumber]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"payment-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Payment ID: ",paymentData.paymentId]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Payment Date:"," ",paymentData.paymentDate&&new Date(paymentData.paymentDate).toLocaleString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Payment Amount: $",paymentData.paymentAmount]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Payment Method: ",paymentData.paymentMethod]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Payment Status: ",paymentData.paymentStatus]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Thanks You for shopping with us...Visit Again!"})]})});};export default Payment;
